app.word:
Add the following redirect URIs to your discord application:
%s
%s
You can create a discord application here
You can create a discord application here
You can create a discord application here
This will be automatically assigned when choosing the server after saving
Should roles that are not mapped to IPS groups be removed from discord members?
Should a member get banned on discord if said member got banned on the forum?
This will update the discord nicks to the member names so the names match on discord/IPS.
Channel to post in if the topic/post is approved.
Channel to post in if the topic/post is unapproved.
Should notifications be sent to discord channels about new topics (does not matter if approved or unapproved)?
Should notifications be sent to discord channels about new (unapproved) topics?
Should notifications be sent to discord channels about new posts (does not matter if approved or unapproved)?
Should notifications be sent to discord channels about new (unapproved) posts?

This will be posted to a channel when there is a new topic.
Available variables:
{poster} = Poster name.
{title} = The title of the topic that is being posted.
{link} = Link to the topic.

This will be posted to a channel when there is a new post.
Available variables:
{poster} = Poster name.
{title} = The title of the topic that is being posted in.
{link} = Link to the post.
Channel to post in if the calendar event is approved.
Channel to post in if the calendar event is unapproved.

This will be posted to a channel when there is a new calendar event.
Available variables:
{poster} = Poster name.
{title} = The title of the event that is being posted.
{link} = Link to the event.
Channel to post in if the file is approved.
Channel to post in if the file is unapproved.

This will be posted to a channel when there is a new file.
Available variables:
{poster} = Poster name.
{title} = The name of the file that is being posted.
{link} = Link to the file.
Your discord email address is not verified!
